name: Upducted
description:
Farmer Zeke is abducted by extraterrestrials, and he must get back to his farm in time to feed the animals.

This is a short game made for April 2020 MAGS, a monthly jam for games made with Adventure Game Studio. Upducted was made with AGS version 3.5 and should be playable on Windows, Mac and Linux. For Linux and Mac, you may need to download the AGS Engine separately and use it to open the game file.: https://www.adventuregamestudio.co.uk

Upducted is Free Software under the General Public License 2.0, with some parts under the Artistic License 2.0. The game assets are available under various Creative Commons licenses. See the game credits for more details.
